entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as someone who is helping Harry look for his stuff, but she declines and instead goes to have pudding.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is being helped by Luna, but he also has an encounter with Malfoy, Crabbe, and Goyle on the Hogwarts Express.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as one of the people who tries to ambush Harry on the Hogwarts Express.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of the people who tries to ambush Harry on the Hogwarts Express.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as one of the people who tries to ambush Harry on the Hogwarts Express.

entities.name: hogwarts express
entities.description: The Hogwarts Express is a train that takes students from Platform 9 3/4 to Hogwarts. It is where Harry has an encounter with Malfoy, Crabbe, and Goyle.

relationships.description: Luna helps Harry look for his stuff.
Malfoy, Crabbe, and Goyle work together to ambush Harry on the Hogwarts Express.
Harry is on board the Hogwarts Express when he encounters Malfoy, Crabbe, and Goyle.
